skins.shipDescription: Omaha-class light cruiser ¨C Memphis, Hull Number CL-12.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am the Omaha-class light cruiser, Memphis. I've hosted some very famous people, as well as served as flagship of the fleet in the Royal front. Make sure you carefully observe my every move!
skins.acquisition: Hmm, so you're the commander here? Don't worry, I'll carry out my duties as an escort ship. But first, you'll have to meet my standards!
skins.login: Commander, you sure took your time getting here. Come on, let's set sail. Can you keep up with me?
skins.details: If you intend to keep me by your side, you'd better carefully observe my every move!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Capturing everyone's attention with my brilliant performance at Naval Reviews - that's the way I like to do things.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Because of my hectic schedule, I never got much time to relax back in port... But that's fine, someone like me ought to be busy, wouldn't you agree~?
skins.secretaryIdle3: You want me to bring you back a souvenir next time? Should you really be asking that while you still have work to do?
skins.secretaryTouch: Hm? You'd like to see me while I'm training? Very well... you'd better burn this into your eyes!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you don't unhand me this instant, I'll make you regret it~

skins.shipDescription: Oh my, do I really look so unusual in this outfit? I want to be able to enjoy my day off as well, you know? Hehe, don't you think it feels nice to just sit back and take in the ocean breeze?
skins.acquisition: Oh my, do I really look so unusual in this outfit? I want to be able to enjoy my day off as well, you know? Hehe, don't you think it feels nice to just sit back and take in the ocean breeze?
skins.login: Morning. There's a nice wind blowing today. Perfect for a cruise, wouldn't you say?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Phew... Let's hope this will be a relaxing day... Hey, Commander, you know what "work hard, play hard" means, right?
skins.secretaryIdle2: My pictures? I wouldn't say I put the pros to shame, but I am experienced. Don't go underestimating my ability.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Brooklyn and I sometimes go out on day trips. Unlike me though, she just refuses to relax even on vacation days... Or rather, we each relax in very different ways, I suppose.
skins.secretaryTouch: Training? Hello, do you not understand what it means to be on vacation?

skins.shipDescription: We have to work hard if we want to play hard, isn't that right, Commander? Are you ready for our happy Halloween?
skins.acquisition: We have to work hard if we want to play hard, isn't that right, Commander? Are you ready for our happy Halloween?
skins.login: Commander, you came at just the right time~! Shall we go carve the jack-o'-lanterns together? Just make sure you keep up with my high standards!
skins.details: Commander, are you here to trick-or-treat? Here, I got this candy from Abercrombie.
skins.secretaryIdle1: I'll let you handle giving candy out to the trick-or-treaters, Commander~ Me? Hehe, of course I'm going to go bring back more candy~
skins.secretaryIdle2: I'm a witch now, so if you're not on your best behavior, I'll turn you into a critter~ Hehe, just kidding!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Look, a witch and her broomstick are always paired together. I won't hear your objections!
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, you'd like to sit on the broom with me? I suppose you can... but it's not my problem if you fall off, okay?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: ... I should just boot you off the broomstick and be done with it!
